mapper.update: update HX_DATABASE set ADDRESS = #{ADDRESS}, PURPOSE = #{PURPOSE}, AREA = #{AREA}, HOUSE_TYPE = #{HOUSE_TYPE}, FLOOR = #{FLOOR}, BUILD_YEAR = #{BUILD_YEAR}, REMARK = #{REMARK}, PRICE = #{PRICE}, ADCD = #{ADCD}, DATABASE_ID = DATABASE_ID where DATABASE_ID = #{DATABASE_ID}
mapper.select: select ADDRESS, PURPOSE, AREA, HOUSE_TYPE, FLOOR, BUILD_YEAR, USER_ID, CREATE_TIME, DATABASE_ID, REMARK, PRICE, ADCD from HX_DATABASE where DATABASE_ID = #{DATABASE_ID}
